pre_caption: This is a dramatic time-lapse video of a powerful storm developing over a desert landscape. Massive, dark purple and gray clouds churn and swirl rapidly across the sky. A concentrated column of heavy rain descends in the distance, moving across the arid terrain dotted with saguaro cacti and sparse vegetation.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
